description: Creates a worker. A worker tells your instance how much processing power (vCPU), and memory (GiB) you'll need to assemble the digital assets held within a particular instance. You can specify certain instance types to use, or let the worker know which instances types to exclude.

parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID of the farm to connect to the worker.

parameters.name: fleetId
parameters.description: The fleet ID to connect to the worker.

parameters.name: hostProperties
parameters.description: The IP address and host name of the worker. ipAddresses (dict) --- The IP address of the host. ipV4Addresses (list) --- The IpV4 address of the network. (string) --- ipV6Addresses (list) --- The IpV6 address for the network and node component. (string) --- hostName (string) --- The host name.

nested_params.name: ipAddresses
nested_params.description: The IP address of the host.

nested_params.name: ipV4Addresses
nested_params.description: The IpV4 address of the network.

nested_params.name: ipV6Addresses
nested_params.description: The IpV6 address for the network and node component.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: The unique token which the server uses to recognize retries of the same request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Each tag consists of a tag key and a tag value. Tag keys and values are both required, but tag values can be empty strings. (string) --- (string) ---
